frequency.1hrCM: monthly-mean diurnal cycle resolving each day into 1-hour means
frequency.1hrPt: sampled hourly, at specified time point within an hour
frequency.3hrPt: sampled 3 hourly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.6hrPt: sampled 6 hourly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.monC: monthly climatology computed from monthly mean samples
frequency.monPt: sampled monthly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.subhrPt: sampled sub-hourly, at specified time point within an hour
frequency.yrPt: sampled yearly, at specified time point within the time period

grid_label.gn: data reported on a model's native grid
grid_label.gnNH: data reported on a native grid in the Northern Hemisphere
grid_label.gnSH: data reported on a native grid in the Southern Hemisphere
grid_label.gna: data reported on a native grid in the region of Antarctica
grid_label.gng: data reported on a native grid in the region of Greenland
grid_label.gnz: zonal mean data reported on a model's native latitude grid
grid_label.gr: regridded data reported on the data provider's preferred target grid
grid_label.gr1: regridded data reported on a grid other than the native grid and other than the preferred target grid

AMSRE-v7.source: AMRSE v7 v7 (2011): Sea Surface Temperature from AMSR-E onboard AQUA

AVISO-1-0.source: AVISO 1 0 1.0 (2011): Sea Surface Height Above Geoid

Aura-MLS-v04-2.source: Aura-MLS v04.2 (2018): EOS Aura Microwave Limb Sounder

CMSAF-CLARA-A-2-0.source: CMSAF-CLARA-A 2.0 (2017): CM SAF cLoud, Albedo and surface RAdiation dataset from AVHRR data

CMSAF-HOAPS-4-0.source: CMSAF-HOAPS 4.0 (2017): Hamburg Ocean Atmosphere Parameters and fluxes from Satellite data, based on SSM/I and SSMIS aboard DMSP

CMSAF-SARAH-2-0.source: CMSAF-SARAH 2.0 (2017): Surface solAr RAdiation data set - Heliosat, based on MVIRI/SEVIRI aboard METEOSAT

ESACCI-CLOUD-ATSR2-AATSR-2-0.source: ESACCI-CLOUD-ATSR2-AATSR 2.0 (2017): Cloud properties derived from ATSR2 and AATSR (aboard ERS2 and ENVISAT) measurements. This dataset belongs to the ESA Cloud_cci suite of long-term coherent cloud property datasets.

ESACCI-CLOUD-AVHRR-AM-2-0.source: ESACCI-CLOUD-AVHRR-AM 2.0 (2017): Cloud properties derived from AVHRR (aboard NOAA and MetOp AM) measurements. This dataset belongs to the ESA Cloud_cci suite of long-term coherent cloud property datasets

ESACCI-CLOUD-AVHRR-PM-2-0.source: ESACCI-CLOUD-AVHRR-PM 2.0 (2017): Cloud properties derived from AVHRR (aboard NOAA and MetOp PM) measurements. This dataset belongs to the ESA Cloud_cci suite of long-term coherent cloud property datasets

ESACCI-CLOUD-MERIS-AATSR-2-0.source: ESACCI-CLOUD-MERIS-AATSR 2.0 (2017): Cloud properties derived from MERIS and AATSR (aboard ENVISAT) measurements. This dataset belongs to the ESA Cloud_cci suite of long-term coherent cloud property datasets.

GNSS-RO-1-3.source: GNSS-RO 1.3 (2016): Global Navigation Satellite Systems Radio Occultation

GPCP-1DD.source: GPCP 1DD 1.3 (2013): Global Precipitation Climatology Project One Degree Daily

GPCP-SG.source: GPCP SG 2.3 (2016): Global Precipitation Climatology Project Satellite-Gauge

NOAA-NCEI-ERSST-4-0.source: NOAA-NCEI-ERSST 4.0 (2015): Extended Reconstructed Sea Surface Temperatures

NOAA-NCEI-FAPAR-4-0.source: NOAA-NCEI-FAPAR 4.0 (2014): AVHRR Fraction of Absorbed Photosynthetically Active Radiation

NOAA-NCEI-GridSat-4-0.source: NOAA-NCEI-GridSat 4.0 (2015): Gridded Satellite ISCCP B1 11 Micron Brightness Temperature

NOAA-NCEI-HIRS-OLR-1-2.source: NOAA NCEI HIRS OLR 1.2 (2014): HIRS Outgoing Longwave Radiation

NOAA-NCEI-OISST-2-0.source: NOAA NCEI OISST 2.0 (2008): Optimal Interpolation Sea Surface Temperature

NOAA-NCEI-PERSIANN-1-1.source: NOAA-NCEI-PERSIANN 1.1 (2014): Precipitation Estimation from Remotely Sensed Information using Artificial Neural Network

NOAA-NCEI-SSMI-SeaIce-2-0.source: NOAA-NCEI-SSMI-SeaIce 2.0 (2013): SSMI Passive Microwave Sea Ice Area Fraction

QuikSCAT-v20110531.source: QuikSCAT v20110531 (2011): QuikSCAT winds monthly climatology derived from QuikSCAT L2B using the 2006 model function and processing algorithms.

RSS-v7.source: RSS-v7 v7 (2011): Satellite derived fields produced by RSS

source_type.gridded_insitu: gridded product based on measurements collected from in-situ instruments
source_type.reanalysis: gridded product generated from a model reanalysis based on in-situ instruments and possibly satellite measurements
source_type.satellite_blended: gridded product based on both in-situ instruments and satellite measurements
source_type.satellite_retrieval: gridded product based on satellite measurements
